title.rendered: STEDI Projector HIR2 (9012) LED Headlight Globes (Pair)

content.rendered:
Designed strictly for HIR2 projector headlamps only.

DETAILS

The optical design of a reflector headlamp is very different from that of a projector-based headlight. Designing LED headlight conversion, which is useful on both platforms, is a balancing act full of compromises. Enter our all-new Projector specific LED upgrade “Project.”

Let’s talk about performance. Our back to back tests on projector headlamps has yielded an average increase in 300% in peak intensity.  Add to this the overall beam has incredible width, endless light volume, and incredibly smooth free of any dominate shadows or hotspots.

Modern vehicles like the Toyota Corolla and Fortuner have incredibly small headlight dust-caps which present cooling and fit challenges.  The integrative active cooling has been optimised to fit inside the tightest HIR2 headlight application.

KEY BEAM CHARACTERISTICS

CCT 5700K means colours sync with our auxiliary LED driving lights.

OEM matching light distribution through the exact positioning of the LED emitters to match the optical properties of the projector headlight. All of our test have markedly improved on even the original headlamp beam pattern, with a fuller and more homogenous light distrubtion.

One of the critical advantages of projector-based headlamps is that the optical module is fitted with an internal cut-off shield, which keeps oncoming cars from being blinded by stray light scatter, this allows for a brighter light source to be leveraged without fear of poor light distribution.

Instant full beam without any warm-up time.

Electrically Protected against Radio Frequency Interference and Electromagnetic Interference. We guarantee that our upgrade will not cause in static radio noise.

Over and Under Voltage Protection

INSTALLATION.

Matching plug and play connectors to suit the vehicle OE HIR2 (9012) connector.

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

INPUT POWER 42W
BEAM ANGLE 270 °
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 9V to 22V DC
CURRENT DRAW 3.5A ± 0.2A (each) @13.6v
KELVIN 5700K
TESTED LUMENS 3,700LM (each)
COMPATIBILITY Projector Lens only
FIT COMPATIBILITY  HIR2 (9012)
COOLING EFFICIENCY 7500w / m.k

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x HIR2 (9012) STEDI PROJECT Headlight LED Conversion
  • User Instruction Manual

excerpt.rendered:
PROJECTOR HIR2 (9012) LED HEAD LIGHT UPGRADE (PAIR)

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
